kv4.8:1.1: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyoti?
kv4.8:4.5: Hañci bhagavā sayambhū, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.8:5.1: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyoti?
kv4.8:5.3: Bhagavatā bodhiyā mūle tīṇeva sāmaññaphalāni abhisambuddhānīti?
kv4.8:6.1: Nanu bhagavatā bodhiyā mūle cattāri sāmaññaphalāni abhisambuddhānīti?
kv4.8:6.3: Hañci bhagavatā bodhiyā mūle cattāri sāmaññaphalāni abhisambuddhāni, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.8:7.1: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyoti?
kv4.8:8.1: Bodhisatto aparantapaṁ akāsi, aññaṁ satthāraṁ uddisīti?
kv4.8:9.1: Āyasmā ānando bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, āyasmā ānando bhagavato sāvakoti?
kv4.8:9.3: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato sāvakoti?
kv4.8:10.1: Citto gahapati hatthako āḷavako bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, citto gahapati hatthako āḷavako bhagavato sāvakoti?
kv4.8:10.3: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato sāvakoti?
kv4.8:11.1: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, na ca kassapassa bhagavato sāvakoti?
kv4.8:11.3: Āyasmā ānando bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, na ca bhagavato sāvakoti?
kv4.8:12.1: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, na ca kassapassa bhagavato sāvakoti?
kv4.8:12.3: Citto gahapati hatthako āḷavako bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, na ca bhagavato sāvakoti?
kv4.8:13.1: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, na ca kassapassa bhagavato sāvakoti?
kv4.8:14.5: “kassape ahaṁ, ānanda, bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ acariṁ āyatiṁ sambodhāyā”ti.
kv4.8:15.1: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyoti?
kv4.8:20.1: “Yathā kho tvaṁ, āvuso, paṭijānāsi, arahasi anantajino”ti?
kv4.8:23.1: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyoti?
kv4.8:23.4: “‘idaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
kv4.8:23.5: ‘Taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ pariññeyyan’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
kv4.8:23.6: pariññātanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe… āloko udapādi.
kv4.8:23.8: ‘taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhasamudayaṁ ariyasaccaṁ pahātabban’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
kv4.8:23.11: ‘taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhanirodhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ sacchikātabban’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
kv4.8:23.14: ‘taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṁ bhāvetabban’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
kv4.8:23.15: bhāvitanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādī”ti.
